nodes.documentation:
@title Whitelisted
@notice Allows the owner to add and remove addresses from a whitelist
nodes.name: Whitelisted

nodes.documentation:
@notice Adds an address to the whitelist
@param _user The address to whitelist
nodes.name: addToWhitelist

nodes.documentation:
@notice Removes an address from the whitelist
@param _user The address to remove
nodes.name: removeFromWhitelist

nodes.documentation: @dev reverts if the caller is not whitelisted
nodes.name: isWhitelisted

acceptOwnership().details: Allows an ownership transfer to be completed by the recipient.

transferOwnership(address).details: Allows an owner to begin transferring ownership to a new address, pending.

addToWhitelist(address).notice: Adds an address to the whitelist

removeFromWhitelist(address).notice: Removes an address from the whitelist

userdoc.notice: Allows the owner to add and remove addresses from a whitelist
